price: “Dhugumatti, isaan Rabbi irratti kijiba uumanu hin milkaa’anu” jedhi.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul inna alladhīna yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba lā yuf'liḥūna
